summary: Thanks for your great posts! With the news that KE2 will start in April for American folk, do you know of any legitimate way...
question: Thanks for your great posts! With the news that KE2 will start in April for American folk, do you know of any legitimate way British people can watch BBC America? I'm quite happy to pay for it but I can't find any service that lets Brits watch this channel and I bet we don't get series 2 until September 2019 at the earliest. Any ideas anyone?!
answer:
You’re very welcome! There unfortunately isn’t a legitimate way to watch when it airs in the US if you don’t live there. 

*whispers* You could use a vpn, streaming or torrent sites if you can’t wait.

summary: @purimgifts is an annual all-fandoms-welcome exchange for fanfic and podfic (either or both, participant’s choice!) with a...
caption:
@purimgifts is an annual all-fandoms-welcome exchange for fanfic and podfic (either or both, participant’s choice!) with a side-helping of art, focusing on characters who’re at least one of: women, Jewish or persecuted by evil viziers.

This choice of focus is because this exchange celebrates the Jewish Holiday of Purim, which commemorates one smart orphan-girl saving her people from genocide (plotted by the king’s vizier) and becoming a queen while she’s at it. You totes don’t have to be Jewish to participate, in case that wasn’t obvious.

Is my fandom eligible? ALL fandoms are eligible; “nominations” is a misnomer - all fandoms will be approved unless they’re, like, a romance between a Nazi officer and Jewish inmate or something else of that sort and scale. Nominations and signups will run concurrently.

Do I have to request/offer both fanfic and podfic? Nope! You can request/offer only one or the two, or request both and offer one, or really any combination thereof; you can also make separate requests/offers for each! If this is confusing to you, we warmly suggest you visit @purimgifts and read our rules, FAQ and Signup Guide, all of which are conveniently accessible from there.

How’s the podfic to fanfic ratio? How this year goes is up to you, but in previous years we’ve had way more podfic requests than offers, so more podfic offerers would be awesome!

Got more questions? You can send us an ask or write us an email (purim_gifts@yahoo.com). We only bite hamantaschen, promise!

summary: Soka, do you have any favorites for GGs this year?
question: Soka, do you have any favorites for GGs this year?
answer:
Yes!!

Sandra Oh (puhleez!) or Keri Russell, Lady Gaga, Rami Malek, Mahershala Ali, Matthew Rhys, Constance Wu.

Also, watch Roma if you get a chance.

summary: If you genuinely think... like GENUINELY think Killing Eve is going to end without Eve completely covered in blood...
body: If you genuinely think… like GENUINELY think Killing Eve is going to end without Eve completely covered in blood (metaphorically or otherwise) you are wrong… sis is about to have the greatest “turn towards darkness” arc we’ve ever seen… miss sandra oh is going to bring the performance… you WISH you had the range…

blog.name: ao3feed-villaneve
blog.title: Villaneve ao3feed
blog.description: ao3 feed for Villanelle and Eve Polastri from Killing Eve

title: Good Girl
description:
by Spencyfrenchy

She knows she should have never let her fascination reach these levels. She should’ve never gotten involved. Maybe then she’d still have her job, her husband, and her best friend. But that’s not the case, and that’s why she’s here now, in Villanelle’s Parisian apartment, hating the world, hating herself, and hating a psychopathic assassin that she’s also falling in love with.

Words: 3274, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Killing Eve (TV 2018)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/F
  • Characters: Eve Polastri, Villanelle | Oksana Astankova
  • Relationships: Eve Polastri/Villanelle | Oksana Astankova
  • Additional Tags: Knifeplay
